title: Create Service Category Components
description: Develop UI components for managing service categories including listing and creation forms

user_stories: As a service provider, I want to categorize my services so customers can find them easily
As an administrator, I want to manage service categories so that the system stays organized
business_rules: Category listing must support hierarchical navigation
Category creation form must validate required fields
Category components must follow the design system
Category components must handle loading states and error messages
edge_cases: Managing category creation with validation errors
Processing category updates with existing services
Displaying category information with proper hierarchy

acceptance_criteria: Category list component displays categories with hierarchy
Category creation form validates required fields and displays errors
Category components follow the design system
Category components handle loading states and error conditions properly
Category components integrate with Service Management API endpoints

integration_tests: Category components integration with backend APIs

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement category components following Angular best practices. Ensure proper integration with service management API. Implement hierarchical category display and management.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper authorization checks for category management operations. Implement appropriate validation for category input. Protect sensitive category information.
